article_title: A Few Words About Bitcoin... Because Fiat Is Not Just A Car

article_metadata.description: With Bitcoin becoming increasingly popular, "fiat" has also made a resurgence in our lexicon. No, I'm not talking about that cute Italian car, which has become all the rage with American drivers. Fiat has a strong relationship to money, as in fiat currency, and it's nothing new. Make sure that the conversation about Bitcoin and fiat currency hits the dining room tonight with your children and grandchildren. You may not be experts, but it's a worthwhile discussion we should all be having with our families.
article_metadata.author: Neale Godfrey
